text: Plum Trees is an unincorporated community in Curry County, Oregon, United States. It lies along the Sixes River, about upstream of its mouth on the Pacific Ocean near Cape Blanco. Sixes River Road runs by Plum Trees, which is adjacent to the Rogue River – Siskiyou National Forest slightly north of Grassy Knob Wilderness in the Klamath Mountains. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Curry County, Oregon Category:Unincorporated communities in Oregon
title: Plum Trees, Oregon
